text: Had such a great experience here! Dr. Chris Chan Qing Sheng was super nice, patient, and really careful — made me feel very comfortable the whole time. The lady at the reception was absolutely lovely too — so friendly and helpful. Definitely recommend if you’re looking for a place where you’ll feel well taken care of!

I had a great experience with Dr. Chris Chan! He did an excellent job with my fillings, making sure the procedure was painless and comfortable. Dr. Chan is incredibly gentle and thorough, explaining everything clearly and putting me at ease throughout the process. I highly recommend him for anyone in need of dental care!

Dr Chan and the staff are very professional. Was able to get my teeth/gum issues checked and rectified on a PH when many other clinics are closed. Will be coming back more often even though there are other clinics nearer to me. Highly recommended to visit this clinic if you are staying in Punggol. seek a doctor early since health is wealth!
Dr Chris is really very good. He explains, assures and prepares me for every step. He is really confident with sufficient strength, so my whole crown process is painless. I wil only follow him.

The dentist is very patient and both my 73 yo mother and 5yo grandniece felt very at ease as this is their 1st time to dentist.
Dr. Chris explained the process very well and is gentle too. Will come back again and highly recommend to everyone.
